data.quoteText: The Way Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quoteText: The worst form of inequality is to try to make unequal things equal.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quoteText: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quoteText: Life isnt about getting and having, its about giving and being.
data.author: Kevin Kruse

data.quoteText: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
data.author: Florence Nightingale

data.quoteText: You miss 100% of the shots you dont take.
data.author: Wayne Gretzky

data.quoteText: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
data.author: Babe Ruth

data.quoteText: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
data.author: Chinese Proverb

data.quoteText: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quoteText: The best revenge is massive success.
data.author: Frank Sinatra

data.quoteText: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quoteText: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quoteText: Believe you can and youre halfway there.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quoteText: Teach thy tongue to say, “I do not know,” and thous shalt progress.
data.author: Maimonides

data.quoteText: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
data.author: Japanese Proverb

data.quoteText: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
data.author: Confucius

data.quoteText: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quoteText: Happiness is not something readymade.  It comes from your own actions.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quoteText: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quoteText: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
data.author: Joshua J. Marine

data.quoteText: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quoteText: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
data.author: Chinese Proverb

data.quoteText: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
data.author: Vincent van Gogh

data.quoteText: Education costs money. But then so does ignorance.
data.author: Sir Claus Moser

data.quoteText: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucius

data.quoteText: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quoteText: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
data.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

data.quoteText: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.
data.author: Teddy Roosevelt

data.quoteText: If you do what you have always done, you will get what you have always gotten.
data.author: Tony Robbins

data.quoteText: Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quoteText: It is not the years in your life that count. It is the life in your years.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quoteText: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
data.author: Norman Vincent Peale

data.quoteText: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
data.author: Steve Jobs
